Posts.EditableText: This game is an idea I had when I was in game design class my senior year about a lovable green hero who only had a few pixels to fight the evil purple army. I would love to hear peoples opinions on if you would love to play this wonderful tog style text adventure or if it's an idea for a waffle iron in the face.
